articles.title: This portable, rechargeable synth focuses on the pretty side of modular - Engadget
articles.description: Pluto is the latest instrument to try and shrink modular synthesis down to something portable and battery powered.
articles.content: There is a small four-key touch keyboard in the corner. But you’re more likely to rely on the simple four step sequencers for each voice, which can also be set to ping pong or reverse. The steps can … [+790 chars]
